subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Danny Brière scored the winning goal on a rebound with 3 minutes 38 seconds left to lift the Flyers to a 4-2 victory over the Canadiens on Wednesday night.
snippet: Danny Brière scored the winning goal on a rebound with 3 minutes 38 seconds left to lift the Flyers to a 4-2 victory over the Canadiens on Wednesday night.
